text: Store located on East India Dock Road. z As part of the site allocation, the market facilities should be reprovided, with associated storage and waste facilities provided. z This site could potentially be suitable for extra-care accommodation or accommodation for people with learning disabilities. Form, massing, and heritage z Height Strategy: Appropriate height of 88m at the tallest point, which should be located at the southeast corner of the site. Additional taller point located in the section east of Chrisp Street at an appropriate height of 53m. Heights to step down towards the west and north of the site. z The impact of development on nearby heritage assets and SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION
